meanings.definition: The bottom of the ocean or a sea.
meanings.sent1: The divers explored the seabed for hidden treasures.
meanings.sent2: The shipwreck rested on the seabed for centuries.
meanings.sent3: The seabed whispered secrets to the curious fish.
meanings.sent4: The seabed cradled ancient mysteries in its depths.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight danced on the colorful seabed, creating a mesmerizing sight.

meanings.definition: The ground beneath a body of water.
meanings.sent1: The fishermen cast their nets near the seabed to catch fish.
meanings.sent2: The seaweed swayed gently on the seabed with the ebb and flow of the tide.
meanings.sent3: The seabed supported the weight of the playful otters as they frolicked underwater.
meanings.sent4: The seabed held the history of the ocean within its layers of sediment.
meanings.sent5: The seabed was a silent witness to the passing of time in the underwater world.
